Text: Cc As you probably know my brother Rich is jumping on the matrimonial handgrenade this August To provide him with sagelike advice and help him prepare in what may be called a doublevision quest for his day of reckoning my brothers and I are planning to take Rich on a prewedding retreat In all likelihood this weekend will be the last one of July with the first one of August as a backup date The locale will probably be Lake Travis outside of Austin see wwwbartoncreekcom for more information about accommodations Early morning golf swimming evening entertainment in Austin are the planned activities Certainly more information will be forth coming but if joining Rich for this weekend is something you would be interested in doing then please contact me My home is My emails are and I hope to hear from you Tom Pastore

Cc PST Gentlemen As you probably know my brother Rich is jumping on the matrimonial handgrenade this August To provide him with sagelike advice and help him prepare in what may be called a doublevision quest for his day of reckoning my brothers and I are planning to take Rich on a prewedding retreat In all likelihood this weekend will be the last one of July with the first one of August as a backup date The locale will probably be Lake Travis outside of Austin see wwwbartoncreekcom for more information about accommodations Early morning golf swimming evening entertainment in Austin are the planned activities Certainly more information will be forth coming but if joining Rich for this weekend is something you would be interested in doing then please contact me My home is My emails are and I hope to hear from you Tom Pastore
